author: Sudhindra Prasad
title: An experience of a lifetime at the Chinnaswamy Stadium
description: How a bunch of friends managed to get tickets for the India-Pakistan clash and set up a festive atmosphere in the stands | ESPNcricinfo.com
content:
"Shall we swing by the Chinnaswamy?"
This was an oft-used query in my vocabulary while growing up in Bangalore. Once I joined UVCE (University Visvesvaraya College of Engineering) - a convenient five-minute ride away from the KSCA's M.Chinnaswamy stadium - t… [+20487 chars]
